triplets: Safety equipment designed to assist in water rescue and prevent drowning
Water rescue operations, lifesaving assistance, and emergency flotation support
Durable plastic outer shell with buoyant foam or cork core
Circular flotation ring designed to keep a person afloat in water
Attached rope or grip lines for throwing and pulling during rescue
Typically bright orange for high visibility in water environments
Water safety systems, maritime safety equipment, and rescue operations
Various safety equipment manufacturers and maritime supply companies
Approximately 2–4 kilograms depending on size and material
Typically 5–10 years with proper storage and maintenance
